meanings.definition: Not intellectual; lacking in intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: The book was too unintellectual for my taste.
meanings.sent2: She found the movie to be unintellectual and boring.
meanings.sent3: The unintellectual joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His speech was as unintellectual as a child's drawing.
meanings.sent5: The unintellectual behavior of the character was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Not appealing to or characteristic of an intellectual.
meanings.sent1: The unintellectual design of the building disappointed the architect.
meanings.sent2: The show's humor was unintellectual and lacked depth.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unintellectual theme, the movie was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: The unintellectual atmosphere of the party was suffocating.
meanings.sent5: Her unintellectual comments stood out in the intellectual discussion.
